attributes.additional_details: Illegal immigrants cross the English channel nearly every day illegally usually helped by criminal gangs, many have to be rescued when their boat gets into trouble, this method of crossing the channel is not only illegal it is dangerous and many people have died doing so. This costs the tax payer millions of pounds every day we believe this  money would be better spent elsewhere.
attributes.background: We ask the Government to use its powers to end all means of illegal immigration.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about illegal immigration, but we are not surely exactly how you'd like the government to tackle this.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
